data.introduce: 该接口用于手动将票价计算组写入 PNR 中，对应黑屏指令FC。
data.business: 同黑屏FC项输入，支持国内、国际的单程、往返、换开及自由文本格式输入。支持婴儿、IT/BT票FC输入。
data.functions:
基于PNR，支持手工按黑屏指令格式写入FC项。
FC项暂不支持主机换行格式。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirFCIntoPNROrderRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"票价计算组输入请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"Office号","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"AirFCIntoPNROrderInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"","children":[{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"PNR号和订单号信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"PNR号或订单号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"标识类型","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"FC","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"手动输入FC指令：FC:PEK CA SHA 1000.00Y CNY1000.00END","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PassengerNames","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"旅客姓名列表","children":[{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"旅客姓名","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"Infant","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..n","description":"婴儿标识","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""}]

信息","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"PNR号和订单号信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"PNR号或订单号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"标识类型","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"Result","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"FC输入返回结果：9位","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"编码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"文本","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"错误类型","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirFCIntoPNROrderRQ>
    <POS>
        <!-- office号,属性PseudoCityCode存值 -->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191"/>
    </POS>
    <AirFCIntoPNROrderInfo>
        <BookingReferenceID ID="HR6R3T" ID_Context="PNR" />
        <BookingReferenceID ID="240423140900813d9c4" ID_Context="ORDER"/>
        <!-- FC信息 -->
        <FC>FC:PEK CA SHA 1000.00Y CNY1000.00END</FC>
        <!-- 婴儿标识 -->
        <Infant>false</Infant>
        <!-- 旅客姓名 -->
        <PassengerNames>
            <PassengerName>TEST/ADT</PassengerName>
        </PassengerNames>
    </AirFCIntoPNROrderInfo>
</TES_AirFCIntoPNROrderRQ>
